text: Very cool <@U061A3E0G>!  Having a hard time reading some of the company names.
Are you generating the tool tip text programmatically, or still manually?
It's from the dataset, just in a more semantic format. I think I might be aiming at this threshold of intuition vs hard fact somehow...

Like, in some ways the current system is a visually interesting and delightful pivot table, with transitions that kind of massage the eyes... and subtle interface conventions to enable curiosity reasoning and exploration, rather than hard facts/absolute figures
Yeah so obscuring the names a little bit helps encourage more curiosity kinda?
Right, and start up names are so whacky anyways
I can see that. It is delightful, I pulled it up on my phone and it was fun to move the bubbles around :smiley:
I have algorithmic layouts going, but they don't take consideration screen size yet
Is this on github? There's a small typo
thnx! It is a branch in the previous innovation map, but the data is from a google spreadsheet
In the tool tip you want to change it's to its
I used this <http://getmdl.io> as the ui framework, and good ole d3 for the viz
